question: Which are the basin countries of the "Shebelle River"?
explanation: Ethiopia and Somalia are the two basin countries of the Shebelle River. This river rises from the Ethiopian Highlands and joins Jubba River, in Somali near Mogadishu, depends upon their seasonality. This river houses Melka Wakena Dam, Ethiopia's largest hydroelectric generator, built on the upper reaches of the river in the Bale Mountains.
